announcements.title: New Water Supply Initiative
announcements.content: We are excited to announce a new initiative aimed at improving water supply in the city. This project will begin on March 1st and is expected to be completed by June 30th.

announcements.title: Road Maintenance Schedule
announcements.content: Please be informed that road maintenance will take place from April 5th to April 15th. Expect delays in traffic during this period.

announcements.title: Sanitation Drive
announcements.content: Join us for a city-wide sanitation drive on May 10th. Volunteers are welcome! Together, we can keep our city clean.

announcements.title: Public Health Awareness Campaign
announcements.content: A public health awareness campaign will be held on June 15th. Free health check-ups and consultations will be available.

announcements.title: Community Feedback Session
announcements.content: We invite all residents to a community feedback session on July 20th at the community center. Your input is valuable to us!
